long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📦 Amazon Order Tracking Extractor

The Amazon Order Tracking Extractor is a simple tool that helps sellers quickly extract tracking numbers from Amazon Seller Central orders. This easy-to-use extension lets you input order IDs and automatically retrieves the tracking numbers, displaying them in a neat table for easy access. You can copy all tracking numbers with a single click for use in Google Sheets.

✨ Key Features: 
* 🚚 Quick Extraction: Fetch tracking numbers directly from Amazon Seller Central.
* 🖥️ User-Friendly Interface: Input multiple order IDs at once.
* 🤖 Automated Process: Automatically opens tabs, extracts tracking numbers, and shows them in a table.
* 📋 Easy Copying: Copy all tracking numbers with one click, formatted perfectly for Google Sheets.
* 🔔 Completion Alerts: Get a notification once all tracking numbers have been processed.

🛠️ How to Use:
* 🔑 Log in to your Amazon Seller Central account (required for the extension to work).
* 📝 Open the extension and enter your Amazon order IDs in the provided textarea.
         Click "Start Extraction" to begin the process.
* 🚀 The extension will extract the tracking numbers and display them in a table.
* ✅ Once completed, you'll receive a notification.
* 📑 Use the "Copy Tracking Numbers" button to copy and paste the data into Google Sheets 
         (each tracking number will be placed in its own column).

🔒 Permissions & Privacy:
* 🔑 Permissions: The extension needs access to Amazon Seller Central order pages to extract 
         tracking numbers.
* 🔐 Privacy: No personal data is collected or stored. The extension only interacts with Amazon 
         Seller Central for tracking number extraction.

💬 Support:
***For any assistance or feedback, feel free to contact us at mirailit.online@gmail.com.

This extension is designed to make order tracking simple, fast, and efficient. 🎉
